entries.self_destruct_aborted: System detects lifeforms inside building. Shutting down self destruct.
entries.m3_data_disk_denied: You were unable to receive the data disk because your inventory is full. You need to make space available.
entries.m3_data_disk_received: You have been given a data disk.
entries.m3_broken_grav_unit_denied: You were unable to receive the broken grav unit because your inventory is full. You need to make space available.
entries.m3_broken_grav_unit_received: You have been given a broken grav unit.
entries.m2_repair_kit_denied: You were unable to receive the grav unit repair kit because your inventory is full. You need to make space available.
entries.m2_repair_kit_received: You have been given a grav unit repair kit.
entries.mission_complete: CONGRATULATIONS!!  You have completed the Cries of Alderaan Stroy Arc.
entries.m5_init_failure: The research facility at these coordinates must have already been destroyed.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_5: Report to Colonel Veers with news of your mission.
entries.waypoint_desc_5: Destroy the Dead Eye Research Facility at these coordinates.
entries.waypoint_desc_4: Colonel Veers wishes to speak with you.  Report to him at this location immediately.
entries.m3_init_failure: It appears the flora warehouse at this location has already been destroyed.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_3: Return to the Imperial Tactical Officer and report your findings.
entries.waypoint_desc_3: Destroy the Flora Warehouse located at these coordinates and confiscate any Alderaanian Flora found.
entries.m2_init_failure: It appears the caravan leader is no longer at this location.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_2: Return to the Imperial Coordinator and report your findings.
entries.waypoint_desc_2: Contact the Caravan Leader at these coordinates and help reapir the broken grav unit.
entries.waypoint_failure: Your datapad is unable to hold more information. Talk to me after you've cleaned out that useless data you are carrying and I'll download the information then.
entries.m1_init_failure: It appears the lookout is no longer at this location.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_1: Return to the Imperial Coordinator and report your findings.
entries.waypoint_desc_1: Contact the Caravan Lookout at these coordinates and get any information possible about the caravan.
